doc.title: Bin Appetit
doc.plot: Bin Appetit is a TV documentary about the now en vogue environmental movement of Freeganism and follows a group of Freegans traveling across the Anglia region of England in a camper van, surviving on discarded food they find along the way. Bin Appetit explores how these Freegans manage to survive and examines how Freeganism explores aspects of Free Living, such as working for free and free hugs.
